attributes.action: Ignore the request for a second referendum on the UK's membership of the EU.
attributes.additional_details:
It does seem somewhat sour grapes from remain supporters who didn't get the result they wanted and now want to keep going, seemingly indefinitely, until they get the result they want.

This isn't really now democracy works.

You have a vote, the highest amount of votes win.  Simple.

The remain supporters should respect this process and get on board with what the country has decided.
attributes.background:
On June the 23rd the UK public went to the polls to vote on leave or remain part of the EU.
The result was a victory for leave & hence the UK will now begin the process of leaving the EU.
I request that the will of the Great British public be respected and a 2nd referendum request be declined.
